queries.query: INSERT INTO `api_accesslogs` (`vIPAddress`, `vAPIName`, `vAPIURL`, `dAccessDate`, `vPlatform`, `vBrowser`, `vFileName`) VALUES ('103.142.120.91', 'connections', 'http://18.211.58.235/canoodle/WS/connections', '2020-12-23 11:45:17', 'Unknown OS Platform', 'Unknown Browser', 'connections-1608723917.json')

SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iConnectionUserId` IN('14') AND `iUserId` IN('1')

SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iUserId` IN('14') AND `iConnectionUserId` IN('1')
SELECT `u`.`eIsSubscribed` AS `u_is_subscribed`,`u`.`iLikesPerDay` AS `u_likes_per_day`,`u`.`iUserId` AS `u_users_id_1` FROM `users` AS `u` WHERE `u`.`iUserId` = '1'  LIMIT 1
UPDATE `user_connections` SET `dtUpdatedAt` = NOW(), `eConnectionType` = 'Like', `eConnectionResult` = 'Match' WHERE `iConnectionId` = '14' AND `eStatus` IN('Active')

SELECT `s`.`iUserId` AS `s_users_id`,`r`.`iUserId` AS `r_users_id`,`r`.`vDeviceToken` AS `r_device_token`,`r`.`eIsSubscribed` AS `r_premium_status`,CONCAT(s.vFirstName," ",s.vLastName) AS s_name FROM `user_connections` AS `uc` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `s` ON `uc`.`iUserId` = `s`.`iUserId` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `r` ON `uc`.`iConnectionUserId`  = `r`.`iUserId` WHERE (uc.iUserId = 1 AND uc.iConnectionUserId = 14)  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `notification` (`vNotificationMessage`, `iNotifierId`, `eNotificationType`, `dtAddedAt`, `dtUpdatedAt`, `eNotificationStatus`, `iUserId`) VALUES ('Deepali Prabhu has accepted your canoodle request', '14', 'Match', NOW(), NOW(), 'Active', '1')
SELECT `ui`.`vProfileImage` AS `ui_image`,`ui`.`iUserId` AS `ui_users_id` FROM `users` AS `ui` WHERE `ui`.`iUserId` = '1'  LIMIT 1
